name: Derelict Zones
description:
Derelict Zones is a game about diving into the unknown. While trying to gain a tactical advantage in each “zone” environment, the player will have many options and irreversible choices to make, all while trying to outrun the encroaching “fear”.

Derelict Zones is the joint effort of Alex Baker and William Steinman, who operate under the studio Monster Builds. Derelict Zones is their first title, and has been in development since early 2014. Derelict Zones has been featured at several Playcrafting indie game events in New York City, and GDEX 2019 game expo in Columbus, OH.
